concept.title: Access Training Videos
concept.shortdesc: Adobe provides training for Livefyre products on the Adobe Learning Portal.

ol.li: Scroll down the page and click the Explore Now button. The text around the button may vary from the photo shown.
Follow the process to set up a profile to access the Adobe On Demand Digital Learning portal.

The following self-paced trainings are available for Livefyre:
Navigating Studio in Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre (recommended that you take this training first)
Creating and Managing Studio Accounts in Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre
Creating Automatic Content Streams in Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre
Searching for Social Content in Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre
Working with Assets in Adobe Experience Manager Livefyre
